text: Bell is a city in Los Angeles County, California, near the center of the former San Antonio Township (abolished after 1960). Its population was 33,559 at the 2020 census. Bell is located on the west bank of the Los Angeles River and is a suburb of the city of Los Angeles. At , Bell is the thirteenth smallest city in the United States with a population of at least 25,000. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California
title: Bell, California
